meanings.definition: A dry white wine produced in the Frascati region of Italy.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a glass of Frascati with my dinner.
meanings.sent2: The Frascati wine paired perfectly with the seafood dish.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone wanted a taste of the famous Frascati.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of Frascati filled the room, transporting us to Italy.
meanings.sent5: The Frascati's crisp flavor lingered on my palate long after the last sip.

meanings.definition: A town in Italy known for its production of Frascati wine.
meanings.sent1: We visited Frascati to learn about its wine-making history.
meanings.sent2: The vineyards in Frascati are picturesque and serene.
meanings.sent3: In Frascati, even the buildings seem to be infused with the essence of wine.
meanings.sent4: The streets of Frascati whispered tales of ancient winemaking traditions.
meanings.sent5: The sun setting over Frascati painted the sky in hues of grape and gold.
